title: Playing in other countries
body: What region is recommended to play in Vietnam? I'm OCE but then when I'm on vacation in Asia, which region? Riot should make regions for everyone. A LOT of people in Vietnam play LoL

replies.body:
Hey chennyyypanda21,

You can go the the [Network article here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) and learn how to run a tracert to each server. Replace "tracert" with "ping" and it will give you a reading of your latency to those servers and you can see which one provides the best for you. Tracert is like a ping, but it tells you the latency to every server hop on the way there and you don't really need all that info to test your speed.
A majority of the servers listed there will not respond to ICMP requests, hence the suggestion to run a traceroute instead of just spamming packets at them.
I'm a bit confused :P and what if I'm doing it on Mac? Does it matter? Idk :P
Go to the top of the article and click the "MAC" selection button and it'll give you the steps for Mac instead.

Depending on where you plan on vacationing in Asia, your best bet would be to play on garena, however you would have to level a new account.
http://lol.garena.com/home
Thank you! I'll do that when I can
